538500.name: Dead Beats: Soundtrack of Dead
538500.description:
DEAD BEATS


Feast your ears on the original soundtrack for Dead composed by Paul Michael Cardon. Spooky synth and choirs is a good mix.

The soundtrack includes:

01 Title Screen
02 Level Select
03 Progenitor
04 Vesicle
05 Eremite and Spectre
06 Furnace
07 Puppeteer Part 1
08 Puppeteer Part 2
09 Migraine
10 Totem
11 Glass Master
12 The Silenced
13 Scourge's Body
14 Scourge's Limbs
15 Scourge's Eye
16 Dying Ember
17 The Bears Attack

Good music for spooky people.
538500.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
